required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Nicotinamide (NAM) and Pyridoxine (Vitamin B6) on Muscle Regeneration ("Satellite-01 Study").
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of a Mix of Nicotinamide (NAM) and Pyridoxine (Vitamin B6) on Muscle Regeneration: a Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study ("Satellite-01 Study").

brief_summary.textblock: Assessment of safety and efficacy of NAM/B6 oral administration on the amplification and commitment of satellite cells after a muscle injury

detailed_description.textblock: NAM/B6 oral administration after a muscle injury ("Satellite-01 study"): Effect on satellite cells as measured by immunofluorescence (Pax7 and myogenin antibodies to detect amplifying and committed satellite cells, respectively) on sections of muscle biopsies from the stimulated leg (leg 2) by muscle biopsies, comparing the study intervention (NAM/B6) to the control intervention (placebo)

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel group study
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Number of satellite cells as measured by immunofluorescence (Pax7 and myogenin antibodies to detect amplifying and committed satellite cells, respectively) on sections of muscle biopsies from the stimulated leg (leg 2) at day 4 and day 8 (muscle biopsies: MB3 and MB5), comparing the study intervention (NAM/B6) to the control intervention (placebo)

arm_group.description: 2 VCaps® capsules daily (commercial vegetarian capsules made of Hydroxy Propyl Methyl Cellulose, a polymer of cellulose) Dosage per capsule: 357mg of nicotinamide, 9.5mg of pyridoxine and 195mg of microcrystalline cellulose Form:The VCaps® Size 00 will be used. They have a volume of 0.95 ml for 23.3 mm length and a diameter of 8.51 mm head / 8.16 mm body.daily of NAM/B6 Frequency and duration: 2 capsules daily for 9 days
2 capsules daily of microcrystalline cellulose excipient (337mg per capsule) Frequency and duration: 2 capsules daily for 9 days

intervention.description: Single daily dose administration will take place from Day 0 (V1) to Day 8 (V4) around 8 am after an overnight fast from the subsequent evening at 9 pm.
